Text:
Watch the Throne is the debut studio album by The Throne, an American hip hop duo composed 
of Jay-Z and Kanye West. The album was released on August 8, 2011, by Roc-A-Fella Records, 
Roc Nation, and Def Jam Recordings. Recording sessions for the album took place at various 
recording locations and began in November 2010...
